name: 10th Mali Mining and Petroleum Conference & Exhibition
content: The 10th Mali Mining and Petroleum Conference & Exhibition is organised by the Ministry of Mines, Energy & Water, Mali in association with AME Trade Ltd will take place 14 â€“ 16 November 2023\. JMP is already an established event in the global mining & petroleum industry and is the official platform for the government to share and discuss its vision for the future of the national Mining & Petroleum industries with the key stakeholders in the country.
